turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello. how may i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, looking to place an order from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can place the order for you if you'd like.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did u want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for three small pizzas. And I want them to be thin crusts, with sausage and pepperoni as toppings on all three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you want thin crust for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 3 small pizzas, all with thin crust, sausage and pepperoni toppings for all 3. did i get that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $37.87 is the total. should i place the order for pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That That sounds goods. Please go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. it'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you're very welcome. have a great weekend.
